author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CVS Group Says H1 Revenue Rises 21.9 Pct
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - Cvs Group Plc:
* H1 REVENUE ROSE 21.9 PERCENT TO 157.8 MILLION STG * ‍HY LIKE-FOR-LIKE SALES INCREASE OF 5.6%​
* ‍WILL CONTINUE TO REVIEW ITS DIVIDEND POLICY AND EXPECTS THAT A FINAL DIVIDEND WILL BE PAID IN DECEMBER 2018​
* ‍FINAL DIVIDEND 2018, WHICH, IN ABSENCE OF ANY UNFORESEEN CHANGE IN TRADING CONDITIONS, WILL BE AT LEAST EQUAL IN VALUE TO THAT OF 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
